You've hit on a very common scenario. My check of the mesh confirms that there **is** traffic flowing to and from the `reviews-v2` workload over the last 5 minutes (at a rate of about 0.35 requests/sec).

This means the most likely reason your graph is empty is because of the **time duration** selected in the Kiali user interface.

Kiali pages often default to a very short time window, like "Last 1 minute". If the traffic is intermittent, it's possible no requests occurred in the specific 1-minute window you were viewing.

**Please try this:**

At the top of the Kiali page, find the **time range dropdown** (it will say something like "Last 1m") and change it to **"Last 5m"** or **"Last 10m"**.

The graph should then populate with the traffic data that I can see from my end. Also, ensure the refresh interval next to it is not set to "Paused".
